titleStmt.title: 试论唐五代至近现代灵隐寺建筑布局的演变
試論唐五代至近現代靈隱寺建築佈局的演變

Shi lun tang wu dai zhi jin xian dai ling yin si jian zhu bu ju de yan bian Shi lun tang wu dai zhi jin xian dai ling yin si jian zhu bu ju de yan bian [Opinion on the Evolution of Building Layout in Lingyin Temple From Tang and Five Dynasties to Modern Time]

Shilun tang wudai zhi jinxiandai lingyinsi jianzhu buju de yanbian Shilun tang wudai zhi jinxiandai lingyinsi jianzhu buju de yanbian [Opinion on the Evolution of Building Layout in Lingyin Temple From Tang and Five Dynasties to Modern Time]

body.bibl: 赵云, and 黄雯兰. “试论唐五代至近现代灵隐寺建筑布局的演变.” 古建园林建筑, September 15, 2016, 57–61.
